author: Curtis Bunn
title: Empty pews and couples coping: Black Americans adjust, slowly, to working from home
description: Less than 1 in 5 African American workers are able to work from home, despite the pandemic, according to a new study.
content:
For the Rev. Henry P. Davis III, the effortless adjustment to working from home turns awkward on Sundays, his crucial workday.
Davis goes to the office then, to the pulpit. Alone. Instead of preaching to nearly 1,200 worshippers at First Baptist Church of Hi… [+8048 chars]
